properties.title: Luxury Beachfront Villa
properties.description: A stunning beachfront villa with an infinity pool, private chef, and breathtaking ocean views.

properties.title: Modern City Apartment
properties.description: A stylish modern apartment in the heart of Nairobi, close to shopping malls and restaurants.

properties.title: Mountain Retreat Cabin
properties.description: A cozy wooden cabin nestled in the forest with stunning mountain views and a fireplace.

properties.title: Safari Lodge Experience
properties.description: An authentic safari lodge experience surrounded by wildlife and nature.

properties.title: Tranquil Lake House
properties.description: Peaceful lake house ideal for weekend getaways, kayaking, and relaxation.

reviews.name: Alice Wambui
reviews.comment: The view was absolutely stunning and the villa was spotless. Would definitely visit again!

reviews.name: James Kariuki
reviews.comment: Great stay, very relaxing. Wi-Fi was a bit slow but the beach access made up for it!

reviews.name: Sarah Mwangi
reviews.comment: The apartment was modern, clean, and located perfectly in the city center.

reviews.name: Peter Otieno
reviews.comment: Lovely cabin with beautiful views. It gets cold at night, so pack warmly!

reviews.name: Njeri Kimani
reviews.comment: An unforgettable safari experience â€” amazing staff, food, and wildlife sightings!

reviews.name: Brian Maina
reviews.comment: Peaceful lake house with amazing views. Perfect for a quiet retreat.
